thread.title: Olly Murs' brother refuses to end eight-year feud and says he's 'moved on'
thread.title_full: Olly Murs' brother refuses to end eight-year feud and says he's 'moved on'

author: Halina Watts
title: Olly Murs' brother refuses to end eight-year feud and says he's 'moved on'
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Olly Murs ' twin brother has ruled out resolving his feud with the star saying: "I've moved on." 
Last week the Heart Skips A Beat hitmaker, 32, told how he wanted to make peace with Ben Hart. 
Olly said: "I hope we just sit in a room and go, 'It was a bit of a silly eight years, wasn't it?' " 
But now, Ben has revealed to Sunday People how Olly had made no effort to get in touch. 
He said: "I wish him all the best. But I've got my life and he's got his. The last time I made contact I got the door slammed in my face." Olly Murs with his twin brother Ben 
The X Factor star and Ben's bitter fall out dates back to 2009, when Ben called the chart-topping pop star a "self-obsessed sell out" after he skipped his best man duties at his brother's wedding to appear on the semi-final of The X Factor . 
Ben has even taken his wife’s surname in a bid to further distance himself from the Murs family. 
And Olly has confessed it’s one of the hardest things he has to deal with - and he’s ready to bury the hatchet. 
“We never held a grudge, we never fell out when we were at home, ever, it’s hard now not ever having your twin brother around to experience this life that I have now got, knowing that we used to have an argument or a disagreement and we’d just get over it and it would be fine," Olly said. Olly Murs hosted the show with Caroline Flack for one series (Photo: WENN.com) 
The singer, who was speaking on John Bishop: In Conversation with Olly Murs and reported in The Sun , added: “In my head I think that I really hope that the next time I see him, and I don’t know when that’s going to be, but I do hope that will be the case. 
“It sounds weird but I hope we just sit in a room and go, ‘It was a bit of a silly eight years wasn’t it?’” 
Earlier this year, Olly's mum revealed that she was left on the verge of a breakdown after her son Ben disowned their family. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
